body_html:
@myme5261314 Make sure your ~/.gitconfig have this section:

[http]
        proxy = PROXY_IP:PROXY_PORT

This should be enough for all https git url.

boringssl in bazel is another issue, which I believe not related to your proxy settings(git or system).

body:
@myme5261314 Make sure your ~/.gitconfig have this section:

```
[http]
        proxy = PROXY_IP:PROXY_PORT
```

This should be enough for all https git url.

boringssl in bazel is another issue, which I believe not related to your proxy settings(git or system).
